archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.4.8: The crisis management process should help ensure the organisation meets its legal and regulatory responsibilities (e.g. meeting data breach notification laws such as the California Security Breach Notification Law (SB 1386), the EU Directive on Privacy and Electronic Communications 2009 or the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR)).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
